00009 #ifndef __GLAZIERY_PROGRESSBAR_H
00010 #define __GLAZIERY_PROGRESSBAR_H
00011 
00012 
00013 #define GLAZIERY_PROGRESSBAR(variable, area, groupField, \
00014    start, end, current) \
00015    ProgressBar * variable; \
00016    if ((variable = new ProgressBar) == NULL) \
00017       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00018    if (area != NULL) \
00019       ((FieldsArea *) area)->appendField(variable); \
00020    if (groupField != NULL) \
00021       ((GroupField *) groupField)->appendField(variable); \
00022    variable->setStart(start); \
00023    variable->setEnd(end); \
00024    variable->setCurrent(current);
00025 
00026 #define GLAZIERY_PROGRESSBAR_P(variable, area, groupField, px, py, \
00027    start, end, current) \
00028    GLAZIERY_PROGRESSBAR(variable, area, groupField, start, end, current) \
00029    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00030 
00031 #define GLAZIERY_PROGRESSBAR_S(variable, area, groupField, width, height, \
00032    start, end, current) \
00033    GLAZIERY_PROGRESSBAR(variable, area, groupField, start, end, current) \
00034    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00035       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00036 
00037 #define GLAZIERY_PROGRESSBAR_PS(variable, area, groupField, px, py, width, height, \
00038    start, end, current) \
00039    GLAZIERY_PROGRESSBAR(variable, area, groupField, start, end, current) \
00040    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00041    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00042       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00043 
00044 #define GLAZIERY_PROGRESSBAR_M(variable, area, groupField, minimumWidth, minimumHeight, \
00045    start, end, current) \
00046    GLAZIERY_PROGRESSBAR(variable, area, groupField, start, end, current) \
00047    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \
00048    variable->resizeToMinimum();
00049 
00050 #define GLAZIERY_PROGRESSBAR_PM(variable, area, groupField, px, py, minimumWidth, minimumHeight, \
00051    start, end, current) \
00052    GLAZIERY_PROGRESSBAR(variable, area, groupField, start, end, current) \
00053    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00054    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \
00055    variable->resizeToMinimum();
00056 
00057 #define GLAZIERY_PROGRESSBAR_SM(variable, area, groupField, width, height, minimumWidth, minimumHeight, \
00058    start, end, current) \
00059    GLAZIERY_PROGRESSBAR(variable, area, groupField, start, end, current) \
00060    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \
